title: Crime Alert 10.29.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 10.29.19
description:
Random crime plague: Man slashes 14 year-old girl at theme park. Man douses woman with gas, sets her on fire.


This week's podcast is sponsored by the new Wondery podcast Bad Batch. https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/bad-batch/id1482851200

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
